ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Leveling when new
ygData.msgSnippet: In Kelethin a similar way is to buy CB belts and turn them in in Kaladim. But to get good skills, get in a group and fight on orc hill up to lvl 8 then go into
ygData.messageBody:
In Kelethin a similar way is to buy CB belts and turn them in in Kaladim.
But to get good skills, get in a group and fight on orc hill up to lvl 8
then go into CB.
Btw, anyone know of a good place a lvl 36 high elf cleric can solo?
luv,
-Su

> If you're a twinked newbie, buy deathfist belts and turn them in in West
> Freeport and you can go from 1 to about 14 with enough belts in just a few
> minutes LOL. But your skills will suck so this isn't always a good thing
to
> do.
>
> If you're in the EC area, go to an Orc camp and hunt, I always level
nicely
> there.
>
> Lena
>
> > Trying to keep discussions alive........
> > What is a good way to level up fast. Meaning, I see
> > people say things like I can get from level 3-6 in
> > around an hour.
> >
> > Well, the other day, I was on 5 hours and just leveled
> > once.
> >
> > As a Newbie should we venture to more hostile grounds
> > with others to level? Should we go to the same types
> > of places as a group but not form a group so I can
> > level faster? Or just stay in the newbie area until
> > we get there?
> >
> > Enough for now
> >
> > Later all helpfuls.....
> >
>
>
